Feb. 3, 2008 D Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Fourth Section)
Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice from a Specified List Brass at the Guild (Preston) preston-contest-fourth-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Guild Hall (Charter Theatre), Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Best Soloist Trophy - Farnworth & Walkden (Soprano). 7 bands competed.
Oct. 5, 2011, 1:17 p.m. June 29, 2016, 2:28 p.m.
1 Farnworth and Walkden Band Peter Ashley A Cambrian Suite
2 Tarleton and District Brass Gillian Bould A Royal Mile Suite
3 Lofthouse 2000 Brass Band Andrew Whitaker Four Cities Symphony
4 Formby Band Louise Hough Variations on Laudate Dominum
5 Denton Brass Jonathan Davies Four Cities Symphony
6 Backworth Colliery Band Colin Harris Lydian Pictures
7 Blackley Band Adrian Smith Dimensions
